mapper.insert: insert into T_RECIPE_REPLY(rid, userid, replyno, content) values(#{rid},#{userId},replynum.nextval,#{content})
mapper.delete: delete from t_recipe_reply where rid = #{rid} and userid = #{userId} and replyNo = #{replyNo}
mapper.update: update t_recipe_reply set content=#{content}, updatedate = sysdate where replyno=#{replyNo}
